violation.title: The composer.json file should be valid
violation.message: description : The property description is required

violation.title: The composer.json file should not raise warnings
violation.message: Defining autoload.psr-4 with an empty namespace prefix is a bad idea for performance

violation.title: Text files should end with a newline character
violation.message: This file ends with no newline character. It won't render properly on a terminal, and it's considered a bad practice. Add a simple line feed as the last character to fix it.

violation.title: Boolean property should not be prefixed by "is"
violation.message: Boolean property accessor should not be setIsXXX nor getIsXXX but setXXX and isXXX.

violation.title: Commented code should not be committed
violation.message: Commented out code reduces readability and lowers the code confidence for other developers. If it's common usage for debug, it should not be committed. Using a version control system, such code can be safely removed.

violation.title: Unused method, property, variable or parameter
violation.message: This id attribute is declared but never used. You should remove it.

violation.title: Unused method, property, variable or parameter
violation.message: This id attribute is declared but never used. You should remove it.

violation.title: Unused method, property, variable or parameter
violation.message: This name attribute is declared but never used. You should remove it.

violation.title: sleep() should not be used
violation.message: sleep() may create timeouts without even protecting your application.

violation.title: .htaccess should be avoided
violation.message: A .htaccess file has been spotted. You should consider moving it to the server configuration to improve global performances.

violation.title: Default favicon should be changed
violation.message: Default Apple touch Symfony favicon found. This reveals the backend engine of the application and makes it more vulnerable to attackers. Consider using a custom favicon instead - plus, your users will memorize your application more easily.

violation.title: Default favicon should be changed
violation.message: Default default HiDPI Symfony favicon found. This reveals the backend engine of the application and makes it more vulnerable to attackers. Consider using a custom favicon instead - plus, your users will memorize your application more easily.
